verses.roman:
varṣāntare śivānanda lañā bhakta-gaṇa
nīlācale dekhe yāñā prabhura caraṇa

synonyms: varṣa-antare—the next year; śivānanda—Śivānanda Sena; lañā—taking; bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees; nīlācale—at Jagannātha Purī; dekhe—sees; yāñā—going; prabhura caraṇa—the lotus feet of the Lord.
translation: The next year, Śivānanda went to Jagannātha Purī with all the other devotees to see the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
